name: Tank Melee
description:
Tank Melee is a super casual funny multiplayer tank shooting game.

Here shells are no longer single, but fired a lot of fun, funny shells, give you a stimulating game experience.

Game features:
1, Multiplayer confrontation.
2,Melee,Chase 2 modes.
3,10 kinds of distinctive tanks.
4,9 different props to quickly enhance the tank properties.
5, Clever terrain, different play.

Team: Ranger Game
E-mail: rangergame@163.com
